nextButton.description: Choose the next one in the list.

previousButton.description: Choose the previous one in the list.

maleButton.description: Become male, will also randomize all models and colors.

femaleButton.description: Become female, will also randomize all models and colors.

randomButton.description: Randomize all parts that aren't locked down.

lock.description: Lock this part down for the randomizer to ignore it.
